Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2013 07:52AM sinrose50 wrote: I had a lumpectomy last week. My Dr. called me and told me that it WAS a tiny cancer. I'm to go in Monday so she can tell me my options. She did tell me that I will need radiation and will take a pill for 5 years. She didn't tell me the name of the pill. I'm very scared of the side effects..Fatique.. is there weight gain? Can I continue to do my exercises. The pill is an estrogen blocker. She wants to block all estrogen. I didn't think I had any at 62~~! So, I'll have all those symptoms from no estrogen...any body out there on radiation and an estrogen blocker to prevent any more cancer? What were your side effects? I'm just so low right now....
